mapper.insert: insert into items (item_id, item_option, initial_quantity, saled_quantity, product_id, item_sale_price, item_original_price, image_id) values (#{id}, #{options}, #{initialQuantity}, #{saledQuantity}, #{product.id}, #{salePrice}, #{originalPrice}, #{image.id})
mapper.select:
select I.item_id as id, I.item_option as options, I.initial_quantity as initialQuantity, I.saled_quantity as saledQuantity, P.product_name as "product.name", I.item_original_price as originalPrice, I.item_sale_price as salePrice, I.image_id as image, I.item_createdate as createdate, C.company_name as "product.company.name" from items I, products P, companies C where I.product_id = P.product_id and P.company_id = C.company_id
and P.product_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and C.company_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select item_id as id, item_option as options, initial_quantity as initialQuantity, saled_quantity as saledQuantity, product_id as "product.id", item_original_price as originalPrice, item_sale_price as salePrice, image_id as image, item_createdate as createdate from items where item_id = #{value}

select count (*) from items I, products P, small_categories SC where P.small_category_id = SC.small_category_id and P.product_id = I.product_id and P.company_id = #{companyId}
and item_option like '%' || #{criteria.keyword} || '%'
and small_category_name like '%' || #{criteria.keyword} || '%'
and company_id like '%' || #{criteria.keyword} || '%'
and product_show like '%' || #{criteria.keyword} || '%'
and product_createdate > #{criteria.beginday}
and product_createdate < #{criteria.endday} + 1

select I.item_id as id, I.item_option as options, I.initial_quantity as initialQuantity, I.saled_quantity as saledQuantity, P.product_id as "product.id", I.item_original_price as originalPrice, I.item_sale_price as salePrice, M.image_id as "image.id", I.item_createdate as createdate from items I, products P, images M where I.product_id = P.product_id and I.image_id = M.image_id and I.product_id = #{value}

select I.item_id as id, I.item_option as options, I.initial_quantity as initialQuantity, I.saled_quantity as saledQuantity, P.product_id as "product.id", I.item_original_price as originalPrice, I.item_sale_price as salePrice, M.image_id as "image.id", I.item_createdate as createdate from items I, products P, images M where I.product_id = P.product_id and I.image_id = M.image_id and I.item_id = #{value}
